description: HTML source code for a web-based database visualizer interface, including styles and JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as fetching databases, tables, and displaying data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables under a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the list of tables for a given database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display the table data in a scrollable format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates cell HTML for table data, handling different data types and overflow.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
